purpose: Facilitates decision-making and goal-setting by providing AI-driven assistance and automation.
principle: Leverages large language models and agent frameworks to create autonomous agents capable of executing tasks and generating insights.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for easy integration and customization of AI agents.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited stability and feature set; requires setup and configuration for specific use cases.
name: PromethAI-Backend
description: Open-source framework that gives you AI Agents that help you navigate decision-making, get personalized goals and execute them
highlight: Provides AI agents to assist with decision-making and goal execution through a customizable backend framework.
